```{r}
library(yaml)

# --- helpers ----
nz <- function(x, default = "") {
    if (is.null(x) || length(x) == 0 || (is.character(x) && identical(x, ""))) {
        default
    } else {
        x
    }
}
is_true <- function(x) {
    isTRUE(x) ||
        identical(tolower(as.character(x)), "true") ||
        identical(tolower(as.character(x)), "yes") ||
        identical(x, 1)
}


# --- read yaml ----
cv <- yaml::read_yaml("_data/talks.yaml")
conferences <- cv$conferences

# --- separate lists ---
talks_list <- Filter(function(x) is_true(x$istalk), conferences)
posters_list <- Filter(function(x) is_true(x$isposter), conferences)

format_conference <- function(talk) {
    author <- nz(talk$author)
    year <- nz(talk$year)
    month <- nz(talk$month)
    title <- nz(talk$title)
    conf <- nz(talk$conf)
    place <- nz(talk$place)

    # date part: (YEAR, MONTH) or just (YEAR)
    date_part <- if (month != "") {
        sprintf("(%s, %s).", year, month)
    } else {
        sprintf("(%s).", year)
    }

    # core line
    line <- sprintf('%s %s <em>%s</em>.', author, date_part, title)

    if (is_true(talk$isposter)) {
        line <- paste0(
            line,
            " Poster presented ",
            if (is_true(talk$isvirtual)) "(virtually) " else "",
            "at ",
            conf,
            "."
        )
    } else if (is_true(talk$istalk)) {
        line <- paste0(
            line,
            " Talk given ",
            if (is_true(talk$isvirtual)) "(virtually) " else "",
            "at ",
            conf,
            "."
        )
    }

    if (place != "") {
        line <- paste0(line, " ", place, ".")
    }

    # links
    links <- c()
    if (!is.null(talk$abs) && talk$abs != "") {
        links <- c(
            links,
            sprintf(
                '[<a href="%s" target="_blank" title="Abstract">abstract</a>]',
                talk$abs
            )
        )
    }
    if (!is.null(talk$ho) && talk$ho != "") {
        links <- c(
            links,
            sprintf(
                '[<a href="%s" target="_blank" title="Handout">handout</a>]',
                talk$ho
            )
        )
    }
    if (!is.null(talk$slide) && talk$slide != "") {
        links <- c(
            links,
            sprintf(
                '[<a href="%s" target="_blank" title="Slides">slides</a>]',
                talk$slide
            )
        )
    }
    if (!is.null(talk$poster) && talk$poster != "") {
        links <- c(
            links,
            sprintf(
                '[<a href="%s" target="_blank" title="Poster">poster</a>]',
                talk$poster
            )
        )
    }

    if (length(links) > 0) {
        line <- paste(
            line,
            paste(
                '<span class="paper-links">',
                paste(links, collapse = " "),
                '</span>'
            )
        )
    }

    line
}

render_list <- function(items) {
    if (length(items) == 0) {
        return("")
    }
    vapply(
        seq_along(items),
        function(i) {
            talk <- items[[i]]
            item <- format_conference(talk)
            topic_cls <- if (nz(talk$topic) != "") {
                paste0("topic-", talk$topic)
            } else {
                ""
            }
            sprintf(
                '<div class="ref-item %s"><span class="ref-num">[%d]</span><span class="ref-text">%s</span></div>',
                topic_cls,
                i,
                item
            )
        },
        character(1)
    )
}

cat("\n## Talks\n\n")
cat(paste(render_list(talks_list), collapse = "\n"))

cat("\n\n## Posters\n\n")
cat(paste(render_list(posters_list), collapse = "\n"))

```
